Articles.Content:
KSP on Social Media

Located at the top right beside the search bar.

This feature of the new forums is great.  With an easy to access menu for the branches of the ksp social network.  For those of us that do not FB or tweet this allows the information that is posted on these sites to be viewed rapidly.

I tried it and was able to see all of the videos posted to the youtube account.  This one still makes me laugh so hard.

But that worked perfectly fine in vBulletin? Why would it all of a sudden work?

 

i have so many  questions
